name: Get Ball'd (A Bounce Remake)
description:
'Get Ball'd' is a Bounce remake, with all the levels from the original game and some extra features.

. . .  INFO  . . .

This game is a alpha for now.
A lot of improvements will be made to this game to get far away from the Nokia's Bounce as possible.
With this in mind, we would like to ask you for ideas to improve the game, and new features to add to make it more appealing to you!

So, thank you to anyone who decides to help me out. Due credit will be given in the game!

. . . GAMEPLAY . . .

Just like Nokia's Bounce, you play as a ball, no name, and try to avoid obstacles and collect coins as you progress throught the game.
Different skins can be bought for the ball, which currently are all free, using the coins you collected.
The coins in the game also give you points, so that you can improve your score and highscore!

. . . FEATURES . . .

- Move the ball and avoid the obstacles
- Collect the coins
- Improve your highscore

. . . FUTURE FEATURES . .

- Level unlocking
- Skins purchasing
- Upgrades to the ball (more speed, invincibiliity, ...)
- More to come ...

. . . AVAILABILITY . . .

For now, the game will only be available on itch.io, but as soon as it leaves the alpha version, and Android version will be released, and later on a Steam version.

No devlogs so far...
